title: Khawngaih takin aw Lalpa
lyrics:
Khawngaih takin aw Lalpa,
Min hre rawh, min hre rawh;
Khur chungin ka lo kal e,
Ka sualna ngaidam rawh.
Ka sual vangin i thi tawh,
I thi tawh, i thi tawh;
Mahse, i zahngaihnain,
Ka sualna ngaidam rawh.

Aw Isu, min hruai la,
Ka lungngai tawh lo vang;
Aw, ka Chhandamtu ber,
Ka sualna ngaidam rawh.

Bo mah ila, khawngaihna,
Ka ngen ang, ka ngen ang;
Nunna kawng min kawhhmuh la,
Ka sualna ngaidam rawh.
I khawngaihna a inhawng,
A inhawng, a inhawng,
Keimah vanga i tuar kha,
Ka sualna ngaidam rawh.

I thisenin min tleng la,
Min tleng la, min tleng la,
Thisen hluin min bual la,
Ka sualna ngaidam rawh.
Ka rin chuan min ngaidam ang,
Ngaidam ang, ngaidam ang;
Nangmahah ka awm tlat ang,
Lalpa, min chhandam rawh.
